# dictionaries/rougail/01-base.yml

```yaml
---
version: '1.1'
family:
  var2:
    description: The second variable
```
# dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

```yaml
---
version: '1.1'
family:
  description: A family
  var1:
    description: The first variable
```
# Variables

## A family

`basic`
